name: Calambity
description:
The earth is not safe. The mothersheep is coming. Wool you help the earth? Wool you be able to avoid ca-lamb-ity?

Swing asteroids and destroy sheep in this retro-inspired game. Control the earth using the WASD or arrow keys, and use your gravitational pull to swing asteroids into incoming sheep.

Made in 24 hours for the James Cook University Retro Inspired Game Jam 2017 by team DMS - Clarence Tay, David Chew, Wee Boon, and Shan Yong.
